secure_area_confirmation: This is a secure area of the application. Please confirm your password before continuing.
login_description: Enter your information to access your account
name: Name
register_description: Enter your information to create an account
forgot_password_description: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
reset_password_description: Create a new secure password for your account
verify_email_description: Thanks for signing up! Before getting started, could you verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you?
verify_email_not_received: If you didn't receive the email, we will gladly send you another.
verification_link_sent: A new verification link has been sent to the email address you provided during registration.
update_profile_information: Update your account's profile information and email address.
ensure_account_security: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure.
delete_account_description: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted.
delete_account_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
delete_account_warning: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Before deleting your account, please download any data or information that you wish to retain.
no_brands_available_description: There are no brands available at the moment.
name_min_length: Name must be at least 2 characters.
valid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
password_required_deletion: Password is required to confirm deletion
be_first_to_review: Be the first to review this product!
product_description_empty: This product doesn't have a description yet
product_specifications_empty: This product doesn't have any specifications yet
no_addresses: You have no saved addresses. Please add an address to continue.
order_notes_placeholder: Add any special instructions for your order or delivery
order_terms: By placing this order, you agree to our Terms and Conditions
no_orders_description: You haven't placed any orders yet. Start shopping to place your first order!
order_status_processing_description: We're preparing your order for shipment
order_status_shipped_description: Your order is on the way to you
order_status_delivered_description: Your order has been delivered successfully
confirm_cancel_order: Are you sure you want to cancel this order?
cancellation_policy_desc: You can cancel your order while it's still in the processing stage. Once the order status changes to 'Shipped', it can no longer be cancelled.
try_different_keywords: Try different keywords or check your spelling
filter_description: Filter products by brand, category or price range
wishlist_empty_description: Items added to your wishlist will appear here
no_categories_available_description: There are no categories available at the moment.
order_cancelled_message: This order has been cancelled and will not be processed further.
empty_order: This order doesn't contain any items
order_support: If you have any questions about your order, please contact our support team.
address_description: Enter your address details below to create a new shipping address.
payment_message: Please wait while we connect to the secure payment gateway. Do not close this page.
payment_help_message: If the payment window does not appear, please try refreshing this page. For assistance, contact our support team.
try_again: Please try again or use a different payment method
payment_contact_support: If the issue persists, please contact our support team.
invalid_coupon_code: Invalid coupon code. Please check and try again.
coupon_error: Failed to apply coupon code. Please try again.
notes_placeholder: Add any special instructions or notes for your order...
language_preferences_description: Choose your preferred language for the interface.
